name: cboe
description: CBOE full-stack application with Python FastAPI backend and React frontend, deployable to Vercel

scripts.server: cd server && source venv/bin/activate && python main.py
scripts.install:all: npm run install:server && npm run install:client
scripts.start:prod: concurrently "cd server && source venv/bin/activate && python main.py" "cd client && npm run preview"
